overview: When a high school senior trip to the Koaster Kingdom turns into the Underworld's playground, teens must make it to the Cincinnati Airport before dawn. It's the last day of school and the trip to the Koaster Kingdom is tomorrow, but a teen named Trevion Walker wants a partner. Amanda Silverman is stuck trying to put her two best friends, Erica and Maddison back together. Amanda is dealing with the loss of her mother, friends that hate her, and a broken father. Amanda feels isolated until she collides with Trevion in the hallway during sweep hour. They end up skipping school to go to the arcade "High Score Heaven" gaining a strong connection. but sadly, good things never last forever. the Crawlers end up breaking Amamda and Trevion's Strong Dynamic by killing their friends and eating their faces off. only one will die and one will survive.
title: The Nightcrawlers: End Of Revelation
